name: 2021 Roadster
description: Touted to make its return to the lineup in 2021, the new Tesla Roadster picks up where the old model left off.

name: 2022 Cybertruck
description: The Tesla Cybertruck looks like it was dropped off by an alien race, but it has the capabilities to challenge all of the top-selling pickup trucks.

name: 2021 Model Y
description: The latest from Tesla is the all-electric Model Y compact SUV, which shares its platform and most of its cabin with the Model 3 sedan but has more cargo space.

name: 2021 Model X
description: As the SUV cousin of the Model S sedan, the 2021 Tesla Model X might be the greenest—and one of the fastest—ways to tote up to seven people or lots of cargo.
